verses.text: Then said the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** unto me, Go yet, love a woman beloved of her* friend, yet an adulteress, according to the love of the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** toward the children of Israel, who look to other gods, and love flagons of wine.+ 3.1 of wine: Heb. of grapes*
So I bought her to me for fifteen pieces* of silver, and for* an homer of barley, and an half homer of barley:+ 3.2 halfâ€¦: Heb. lethech*
And I said unto her, Thou shalt abide for me many days; thou shalt not play the harlot, and thou shalt not be for another* man: so will* I also be* for thee.

For the children of Israel shall abide many days without a king, and without a prince, and without a sacrifice, and without an image, and without an ephod, and without* teraphim:+ 3.4 image: Heb. a standing, or, statue, or, pillar*

Afterward shall the children of Israel return, and seek the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** their God, and David their king; and shall fear the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** and his goodness in the latter days.
